advantages.title: OUR ADVANTAGES
advantages.experience_description: Our employees are always ready to share their experience, as they run half-marathons, have swum across the Bosphorus, and are preparing for triathlon competitions!
advantages.health_description: We work to ensure your sports activities benefit your health and bring joy to you and your loved ones!
advantages.running_description: We help with training in the right running technique! We are friends with the largest running school in Russia - I LOVE RUNNING.
consultation.title: Get a Free Consultation for Choosing a Heart Rate Monitor
consultation.description: Just fill out the form and we will call you back within 10 minutes
catalog.title: Heart Rate Monitor Catalog
catalog.item_description: For the first steps in heart rate-based training
catalog.detail1: You will hear an audible alert for the required pulse during training;
catalog.detail2: You will see an informative graphic indicator of the target training pulse zones;
catalog.detail3: Also, you will see information about the calories burned during the training;
catalog.detail4: You can view data for 10 training sessions.
reviews.title: Customer Reviews
review1.name: Emily Smith
review1.descr: I didn't know what to buy, so I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked a heart rate monitor that fit my goals and financial possibilities. Later, I decided to update my gadget and went straight back to them. New goals - a new gadget! Thank you, RunSmart!
review2.name: Oliver Brown
review2.descr: Heart rate monitors are cool! Usually, I ran without them and didn't know I was making it worse. Bought one, and also got a training session as a gift. They taught me how to use my new gadget and explained the basics of anatomy, and made a training plan for a month. With them, I prepared for my first half-marathon! Thanks!!!
review3.name: Charlotte Johnson
review3.descr: I couldn't start running for a long time because I would begin but then it became hard and I gave up. Heard about RunSmart and pulse control running from friends and decided to try. I called them, they were interested in my goals and picked a very interesting option with a discount! Now I run and enjoy it! I've already run 2 half-marathons and several shorter races and don't plan to stop. Thank you!!!
